level.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 3 of the Equal Opportunity for Local, Small, or Disadvantaged Business Enterprises Temporary Amendment Act of 2000 (D.C. Law 13-216, April 3, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 3458).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 3 of the Equal Opportunity for Local, Small, or Disadvantaged Business Enterprises Emergency Amendment Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-415, August 14, 2000, 47 DCR 7296).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-301.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-259
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-259, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-301.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-371
level.text: For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-301.01.
